snippet.title: Sonic Smackdown: OG Cast is Complete!
snippet.description:
This video showcases the final update to the OG Sonic Smackdown! Cream the Rabbit was added, and Big the cat was greatly improved. From what I know this is the last large update for Sonic Smackdown in awhile, and the game will later be revamped using a different engine which the creators have been working on. 

Since this is the last major update for awhile apparently, I wanted to go through all the characters updated moves in one video. To save on Time, I played the first two games showing the updated characters, and then after I let oppressive CPUs vs each other. I love the ending character dialogue.

Timestamps:
Cream vs Emerl - 00:00
Big vs Chaos - 2:44
Sonic vs Metal Sonic - 6:09
Tails vs Eggman - 8:52
Knuckles vs Mecha Sonic - 13:14
Shadow vs Silver - 15:14
Rouge vs Vector - 19:12
Omega vs Espio - 22:19
Amy vs Blaze - 25:27
Mighty vs Adelaida - 28:31
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sonic Smackdown by "ArcForged"
https://arcforged.itch.io/sonic-smackdown
